rules.explanation: You may only hide in places that are widely accessible. Any buildings are not allowed as hiding places. If you need to enter one because of a challenge, then try to leave as soon as you are done. Visits to any bathrooms are always allowed, but not for hiding.

You always need to stay within a sensible distance of your teammember(s). All team members are also required to always be on the same transport (if they are at all), so if one member of your team is on a U-Bahn, then your entire team needs to be on that train. This rule can be temporarily disabled by some challenges.
This game relies on honesty, so please be honest about completing challenges, buying transport tickets and everything else.
